dcterms:creator: Yu Qin
Yi Yang
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 559 earnings call audio recordings and their transcripts for 277 public companies in the S&P 500 index. Each call is segmented into a sequence of audio clips aligned with their corresponding text sentences, as spoken by the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) during the call.
dcterms:title: S&P 500 2017 Earnings Conference Calls dataset
